Articles.Content: Hey guys, I was a big lurker on the forums and created an account just now (I don't know why ). I'm also quite experienced in KSP, I've been playing since 0.15/.16 and I've already done most of the things possible, like visiting planets (only Moho and Eeloo left!) and sending our fellow kerbals to the sun. And also, KSP saved my physics test twice (seriously).

run, now's not a good time man... RUN WHILE YOU STILL CAN!

also, welcome
